description: Test missions for TailorYourCV application - The CV Laundry

missions.name: Update CV Flow
missions.description: Test the complete 'Refresh My CV' workflow including upload, processing, and download
missions.mission: Test the Update CV flow: Navigate to localhost:3000, click 'Refresh My CV' button to switch modes, upload a CV file by clicking the upload area, enter update notes 'Promoted to Senior Engineer in December 2024. Led team of 5 developers. Reduced API latency by 40% through optimization', click 'Refresh This CV' button, handle authentication by choosing 'Continue as Guest', wait for processing to complete, navigate to 'My CVs' page by clicking the 'My CVs' button in the header, find the newest CV card, click to preview it, and download the CV file
missions.expectedOutcome: CV is successfully updated, processed, appears in My CVs page, can be previewed and downloaded

validationRules.description: Mode toggle buttons should be visible
Update notes textarea should be visible
Refresh This CV button should be visible
Should navigate to My CVs page
CV card should be visible in My CVs

testData.updateNotes: Promoted to Senior Engineer in December 2024. Led team of 5 developers. Reduced API latency by 40% through optimization. Added new skills: TypeScript, Next.js, System Design.

missions.name: Tailor CV Flow
missions.description: Test the complete 'Tailor for a Job' workflow including JD input, processing, payment, and download
missions.mission: Test the Tailor CV flow: Navigate to localhost:3000, ensure 'Tailor for a Job' mode is selected, upload CV if not already persisted by clicking the upload area, paste job description 'We are seeking a Senior Full-Stack Engineer with expertise in React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Node.js. The ideal candidate will have 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications, strong problem-solving skills, and experience with cloud platforms like AWS or Vercel. You will lead technical architecture decisions and mentor junior developers', click 'Tailor for this Job' button, complete authentication as guest, wait for processing, on preview page handle payment by entering test card number 4242 4242 4242 4242, expiry 12/25, CVC 123, complete payment, and download both CV and cover letter files
missions.expectedOutcome: CV is tailored for the job, payment is processed successfully, CV and cover letter are downloadable

validationRules.description: Tailor for a Job button should be selected
Job description textarea should be visible
Tailor for this Job button should be clickable
Download button should be visible after payment

testData.jobDescription: We are seeking a Senior Full-Stack Engineer with expertise in React, Next.js, TypeScript, and Node.js. The ideal candidate will have 5+ years of experience building scalable web applications, strong problem-solving skills, and experience with cloud platforms like AWS or Vercel. You will lead technical architecture decisions and mentor junior developers. Requirements: React 18+, Next.js 14+, TypeScript, Node.js, AWS/Vercel, PostgreSQL or MongoDB, REST and GraphQL APIs, Git, CI/CD pipelines. Nice to have: System design experience, open source contributions, technical blog writing.

missions.name: End-to-End Complete Flow
missions.description: Test both Update and Tailor flows in sequence to validate complete application workflow
missions.mission: Execute both CV flows end-to-end: First perform the Update CV flow by navigating to localhost:3000, switching to 'Refresh My CV' mode, uploading CV, entering update notes 'Promoted to Senior Engineer. Led team of 5. Reduced latency by 40%', clicking Refresh, authenticating as guest, waiting for processing, going to My CVs page, previewing and downloading. Then return to home page, switch to 'Tailor for a Job' mode, paste job description 'Senior React Developer with Next.js and TypeScript experience required', click Tailor, process the request, handle payment with card 4242 4242 4242 4242, and download. Finally verify both CVs appear in My CVs with different purposes
missions.expectedOutcome: Both Update and Tailor flows complete successfully, two CVs exist in My CVs with different metadata, both are downloadable, job description is saved and viewable

validationRules.description: Mode toggle should work for both modes
Multiple CV cards should exist in My CVs
View JD button should be visible for tailored CV
Download buttons should be available for both CVs

testData.updateNotes: Promoted to Senior Engineer in December 2024. Led team of 5. Reduced latency by 40%.
testData.jobDescription: Senior React Developer with 5+ years experience. Must have expertise in Next.js, TypeScript, React 18+, state management (Redux/Zustand), and modern frontend tooling. Experience with Node.js backend and REST APIs is a plus.

prerequisites: Valid API keys configured in .env file
Sample CV file available in test-fixtures directory
MyContext CLI with Flow Testing MCP installed

notes: Tests use sandbox payment mode with test card 4242 4242 4242 4242
Authentication uses 'Continue as Guest' for simplicity
File upload requires a real CV file in test-fixtures
Processing may take 10-30 seconds depending on API response times
Screenshots are captured at each step for debugging
Tests should be run with --headless=false to observe AI navigation
